values.description: KMS key for MLflow artifacts bucket

after.description: KMS key for MLflow artifacts bucket

description.constant_value: KMS key for MLflow artifacts bucket

artifact_bucket_force_destroy.description: If true, allow Terraform to destroy the artifacts bucket even if it contains objects.

az_count.description: Number of AZs to use (2 recommended)

container_image.description: Container image for MLflow (can be ECR public/private). Example: public.ecr.aws/t9j8s4z8/mlflow:latest

container_port.description: Port exposed by nginx in the container (PORT env var).

domain_name.description: Optional: Route53 hosted zone domain (e.g., example.com). If null, no Route53/ACM resources are created.

enable_https.description: If true and domain_name is set, create ACM cert + HTTPS listener. Otherwise HTTP only.

mlflow_tracking_password.description: Comma-separated passwords for nginx basic auth (matches container behavior).

mlflow_tracking_username.description: Comma-separated usernames for nginx basic auth (matches container behavior).

subdomain.description: Optional: subdomain for MLflow (e.g., mlflow). Used with domain_name.

tags.description: Tags applied to all taggable resources
